articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Google launches Gemini Chatbot service in India, other South Asian nations - Business Standard
articles.description: This announcement marks a significant step in Google's efforts to broaden the reach of its chatbot technology beyond select markets, as per reports by GSM Arena
articles.content:
